title: Dragon Sorceress Zyra @kateykhaos
body:
@KateyKhaos,

Thank you for finally giving what I've been asking for for the past 2 years! A Zyra Skin!! Much Love.

replies.body: Hey! Aw, I'm glad you like her! We really hope this was worth the wait! <3
Yes it was Katey, you know how I love to complain that she didn't have any skins :)
Why'd you have to nerf Zyra's boobs though? D:

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vs23LPXh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-01T18:14:06.052+0000)
>
> Hey! Aw, I'm glad you like her! We really hope this was worth the wait! <3

I'm just wondering, but if Dragon Trainer/Sorceress/Whatever skins come out periodically to lead up to Swain's own skin whenever that comes out, I will look at this post years later and say "Called it!"
